QuestData.Title: Thunder Calls
QuestData.Description: The time to attack the Thunder King has come!$b$bA small group of Kirin Tor awaits you near the Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.$b$bReport to Vereesa Windrunner for further instructions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Vereesa Windrunner at the Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
